description: The TPMP for CFCs in T&T covers the period 2003 to 2008 with zero consumption of CFC targeted by January 1, 2008.  The TPMP will ensure timely sustainable and cost-effective phase-out of CFCs

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description:
The main objective of the TPMP project is to phase-out the use of CFCs in Trinidad and Tobago. The project attempts to accomplish this through the following:
1) The provision of recycling equipment, support and training to Mobile Air Conditioning (MAC) MAC and refrigeration service sector.
2) Introduction of a conversion programme for all commercial refrigeration systems.
3) Demonstration of retrofit programme for MAC, domestic refrigeration, and mini-food market refrigeration.
4) Training programme for existing and new recycling and recovery programmes.
5) Development of policies and legislation.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Terminal Phase-Out Management

title: Terminal Phase-Out Management Plan for CFCs in T&T
